content.name: Shroom Decacap
content.title: Shroom Decacap

traits.name: Fungal Ambush
traits.desc: If hidden among fungal terrain or near other mushrooms, a Shroom Decacap has advantage on Stealth checks.

traits.name: Spore Trail
traits.desc: As it moves, the Decacap can leave a trail of bioluminescent spores. Any creature entering this trail must succeed on a DC 12 CON save or be lightly obscured.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Lurch and Snap
actions.desc: The Shroom Decacap can move up to 10 feet in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks and make one Bite attack at the end of the movement.

content.description:
Tactics:
Decacaps try to surround and isolate prey.

They are drawn to vibrant fungi and humid regions.
